p: Corroborating data from Cunha et al. (2017), the genomes of the CHIVK circulating ECSA strain did not carry the E1-A226V and E2-L210Q Ae. albopictus adaptive changes. In fact, in Brazil, Ae. aegypti is the main circulating mosquito strain ( Cunha et al., 2017; Souza et al., 2019; Xavier et al., 2019). Thus, it is expected that mutations that confer high viral fitness in Ae. albopictus have not been fixed at these locals.
